ValidationRule.description: Once the Donation Imported field has been populated, it can't be changed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), NOT( ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(npsp__DonationImported__c )) ), ISCHANGED(npsp__DonationImported__c), npsp__DonationImported__c <> PRIORVALUE(npsp__DonationImported__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This action can create a duplicate Opportunity. Please navigate to the Account or Contact and confirm that a duplicate has not been created. If it has, please reach out to Gift Processing immediately.
